questions: Is there a fence in the scene?
Is the fence in the shape of a square?
Is there a fig in the scene?
Is the fig in the shape of a teardrop?
Is the carpet of grass fluffy?
model_output:
yes The image shows a wooden fence along the perimeter of a yard.
no The fence follows the contour of the yard and is not in the shape of a square.
no There is no fig present in the scene; it features a yard and a fence.
no Since there is no fig in the image, it cannot be described as being in the shape of a teardrop.
no The grass appears to be artificial turf which has a uniform texture but is not fluffy.
